name: Ocean Buddie
description:
Welcome to "Ocean Buddie: Swimmie's and Landie's Little Adventure"!

Dive into a relaxing, tropical world and join Swimmie, a graceful mermaid, and Landie, a determined human, on their quest to find the long lost Precious Pearl. But there's a catch - Swimmie can only swim and Landie can only walk on land!

In this co-op, split-screen puzzle platformer, you and a friend will need to work together and use your unique abilities to solve challenging puzzles and navigate through the beautiful archipelago of Sandie Islands. Swimmie can glide effortlessly through the water, while Landie is a skilled climber and explorer.

As you journey through this enchanting environment, you'll encounter various obstacles and challenges that will require teamwork and coordination to overcome. Use levers, catapults, and other tools to manipulate the environment and help each other reach new heights. And don't forget about your trusty parrot pal Plastie, who will be there to give you helpful hints along the way!

With stunning art, immersive gameplay, and a heartwarming premise, "Ocean Buddie: Swimmie's and Landie's Little Adventure" is a must-play for anyone who loves puzzles or cooperative gameplay. So grab a friend and embark on an unforgettable adventure together!
